regen.absent_element: budget evaluation in the acceptance or rejection process
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall evaluate whether the job's budget parameter aligns with existing resource constraints and prioritize accordingly.

regen.absent_element: consideration of budget constraints for job acceptance
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall determine whether the job's execution can be accomplished within the given budget, in addition to meeting the deadline requirements.
The scheduler shall evaluate whether the job can be satisfied within the allocated budget before determining the acceptance or rejection of the job.

label: The scheduler shall evaluate the budget for the job.
absence: evaluation of budget for the job
